short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension blocks websites while studying on StudySmart.ai

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension blocks websites while studying on StudySmart.ai. 
- You can list the URL's you want to block
- Turn the website blocker on and of with a simple toggle
- The blocker only works when you opened the study screen
